item.description:
If you find that you will be alone on Christmas Day, come out and join us! Another meetup friend and I are hosting a movie and dine out.

THE MOVIE:: Sherlock Homes -A Game of Shadows

Movie starts at 1:15. Plan on meeting in the lobby at 1:00. I will have either a meetup sign -or be wearing a meetup pin.

THE DINE OUT: Will be at China Blossom, 745 Osgood St North Andover. Our reservation is for: 4:15

The reservation at this time is for "Johannah - meetup group" I will have a meetup table sign. The restaurant is serving a holiday buffet or regular menu.We will be doing an "EL CHEAPO GIFT SWAP". If you'd like to participate, please bring a wrapped gift - value no more than $5.00....the funnier the better! It will be a lot of fun!

***** Come to the movie, the dine out, or both- it's up to you****

I will remit my contact # to all RSVP the day prior. If you miss this, please contact me.
item.name: Movie, Dine Out , & Gift Swap - Christmas Day
